title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
description:
Description:
The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the default value in the list box of a report parameter.
2. Modify the default value.

OB: The default value is not retained after modifying it.

EB: The default value should be retained even after modification.

SR: 
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value in the list box of the report parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Verify that the modified default value is retained.
